reviews.customers_say: Customers love the design of this sweatshirt, particularly for ugly sweater parties, and appreciate its quality and fit. Customers describe the sweatshirt as remarkably soft and comfortable, though opinions on warmth are divided, with some finding it fairly warm while others say it's not very warm at all.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute kitty sweater
items.body: better quality than I expected. pretty warm and the graphic is bright and not fuzzy. Read more
items.author: Coleen Maxwell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun, lightweight, comfortable
items.body: Love this! It's on the lighter side, so I can wear it indoors without getting too hot, yet outdoors it keeps me warm. But the best part is all the comments I get about how they love the design! (Edited to correct a typo.) Read more
items.author: janelle

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Puuurrr - feet!
items.body: Adorable !! I sized way up as the reviews recommended. I got an xxl because I like em baggy - perfect! I love the material and it’s medium thick - perfect for me! Definitely a great choice! Read more
items.author: Shop Amazon 1st!

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Runs a size to big
items.body: This is soft and very bright. Light weight. I am only returning because it runs big. I got an XL but I feel it's about a size to big. My party is Wednesday so it would not of arrived in time for the exchange. The only real problem is it came in just a clear pkg bag. The snow and salt got in it. Didnt damage, but you never know. Plus, people could see it on my porch. But other than that, it is a nice shirt! Read more
items.author: Shelly Goodenough

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Sweater
items.body: I purchased this sweater for a Christmas event for my kid. The fabric was thicker than I expected and was actually really warm. We are pretty close in size so I also wore it to a Christmas sweater party. It fit both of us well. We both are around a size medium and I did size up to a large for an oversize fit. It was only slightly oversized. It washed well and I let it dry flat. It did come packaged in a way where it left some wrinkles in the fabric that were not removed with washing or with me running it through my wrinkle release setting on my dryer. I did not try an iron though. Overall happy with this purchase and the quality received. Read more
items.author: Catherine Brinton

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Sizing small for a large
items.body: Not a sweat shirt, it is a polyester pull over. It's sized to small for a large. I normally wear a medium and order a large if I want to wear a t-shirt up next it and I definitely could not wear a t-shirt under this one which the tag says large. It is very cute tho. Read more
items.author: TERESA MILES

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good ugly Christmas hoodie
items.body: Nice fit and looks a exactly like the picture Read more
items.author: Robert R.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Xmas gnome
items.body: Love it! So comfortable! Read more
items.author: JANICE RODRIGUEZ

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Xmas Pug, Green & Red, Lady Cat, Smile Snowman, Goofytree, Christmas Hat, Reindeer, Snowman, Black Santa Claus, Xmas Hat Reindeer, Meowing. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
